title: ● Are there signs in the separate south where "whites are not allowed "?
subtitle: The existence of "coloured only" businesses under the laws of Jim Crow in the south of the United States is a shock to those who do not know history.
author: David Emery
vclaim: During Jim Crow's era of racial segregation in the South of America, some businesses have put "only color, eggs don't allow" markings on their doors.
